EmailTemplate.name: APJ_Webinar_PCF 2.5 APJ Update_Q219.Invite 1
EmailTemplate.subject: Pivotal Webinar: PCF 2.5 First Look
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
**Pivotal Cloud Foundry 2.5: A First Look** 10 April / 11am SGT
Dear {{lead.First Name:default=Sir/Madam}},
I thought you might be interested in the upcoming live webinar:Â Pivotal Platform Portfolio 2.5 APJ Update: https://www.brighttalk.com/webcast/14883/352034
Date: 10 April 2019
Time: 11am SGT / 1pm AEDT
SAVE YOUR SPOT: https://www.brighttalk.com/webcast/14883/352034
Join Jared Ruckle, Director Product Marketing, Pivotal for a first look at the new capabilities released as part of the Pivotal Cloud Foundry (PCF) 2.5 release with live demos and expert Q&A. Attend this session and learn how you can:
- Accelerate developer productivity with new capabilities that give you more control over your applications - Improve operator efficiency and simplify administration of applications at scale - Reduce risk by keeping your your platform in a secure, healthy state
We look forward to seeing you there.
Regards,
Lionel Lim Vice President and Managing Director, Asia Pacific & Japan Pivotal
